rules.1: Be nice; do not act rude to other people
rules.3: No disruptive behaviour (i.e spam, forcing roleplays, getting too personal etc.)
rules.7: Sharing links to piracy sites and/or downloads is not allowed
rules.8: Be respectful to creators; discouragement is not allowed
rules.9: Always ask for permission to use assets from creators; stealing is strictly forbidden
rules.11: No one-sided politics and/or rage bait
rules.12: Finding loopholes to any of the above rules is prohibited

en.label: English ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸
en.message:
Welcome! Please go to {rules_channel} to find the rules. To get verified, first solve this equation: **({equation})**.

The result is the **Rule Number**. Please copy and paste the **exact English text** of that specific rule into this chat to enter.

*Note: This is an English-only server.*
en.error: Incorrect. Please check your math, look in {rules_channel}, and paste the exact English rule text.
en.hint: *(Example: If the answer is 2, copy the text for Rule 2)*

Willkommen! Bitte gehe zu {rules_channel}, um die Regeln zu finden. Um verifiziert zu werden, lÃ¶se zuerst diese Gleichung: **({equation})**.

Das Ergebnis ist die **Regelnummer**. Bitte kopiere den **exakten englischen Text** dieser Regel und fÃ¼ge ihn hier ein, um einzutreten.

tl.label: Filipino ğŸ‡µğŸ‡­ (by exoduswalker_)
tl.message:
Maligayang pagdating! Pakibasa ang {rules_channel} upang basahin ang mga patakaran. Upang ikaw ay ma-verify, sagutin ang equation na ito: **({equation})**.

Ang resulta ay ng **numero ng patakaran.** Paki-copy-paste ang **eksaktong English text** ng patakaran na iyon sa chat na ito upang makapasok.

*Tandaan: Ang server na ito ay English lamang*
tl.error: Mali ang sagot. Pakitignan ang iyong math, tignan ang {rules_channel}, at i-paste ang eksatong English text.
tl.hint: *(Halimbawa: Kung ang sagot ay 2, i-kopya ang text ng Rule 2)*
